data.message: Sir some one enter my profile site and misused my family photos like put my wife photo and write call for company and his I'd is fake and given below can u suggest how i want complain to FB legal team to take proper action and below the person I'd is given for ur reference and help me plz

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Venkatraman. If you've come across a fake profile, we ask that you report it to us: http://bit.ly/2urOrJq. You can also learn how to control the privacy of your photos by visiting our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2u2z5cY. -Aurora
